text:
I’m doing some testing with that regard. 
I have one DEV host (Server 2019) that was affected by this after the OCT update
– any VM I imported in, with RCT files ,failed to start. 
I then applied the NOV update to this same host, rebooted and performed a few
new imports from the same storage. This time the VMs started without having the
manually remove the RCT files. 
Another DEV host I updated from SEPT directly to NOV. Again, no issues starting
VMs with existing RCT files. 
BRIAN ILLNER 
| 
Senior Systems Administrator 
864.250.9227 Office 
864.679.2537 Fax 
Canal Insurance Company 
101 N. Main Street, Suite 400 
Greenville, SC 29601 
[cid:image001.jpg@01DA1C7E.8FAF7A70]

and destroy all copies of the transmittal. While Canal believes this
transmittal to be free of virus or other defect, it is the responsibility of the
recipient to ensure that it is virus free and no responsibility is accepted by
Canal (or its subsidiaries and affiliates) for any loss or damage arising
therefrom.
